name: ErythrocyteSedimentationRateESRInBlood
title: Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate (ESR) in Blood
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains laboratory observable term codes for Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate results (ESR) in Blood.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to discover or request blood Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate (ESR) level in clinical records.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes laboratory LOINC encoded observable terms representing Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate (ESR) terms in blood.),(Exclusion Criteria: Laboratory LOINC encoded terms that do not represent Erythrocyte Sedimentation Rate (ESR) in blood.)
